unnormalised: Just heard that Dr. Meena Sharma, who used to be HoD at AIIMS, is joining Max Healthcare as their new Chief Medical Officer. Big news for the medical community!
normalised: Just heard that Doctor Meena Sharma, who used to be H-o-D at A-I-I-M-S, is joining Max Healthcare as their new Chief Medical Officer. Big news for the medical community!

unnormalised: Word is, she'll be spearheading some innovative new programs. Apparently, her expertise in cardiology, combined with her experience as a professor, makes her a perfect fit for the role. Folks are saying she's the right person to take Max Healthcare to the next level.
normalised: Word is, she'll be spearheading some innovative new programs. Apparently, her expertise in cardiology, combined with her experience as a professor, makes her a perfect fit for the role. Folks are saying she's the right person to take Max Healthcare to the next level.

unnormalised: Also, Prof. Rajesh Kumar from IIT Delhi received the Padma Shri this year. Huge congratulations to him! His work in quantum computing has been groundbreaking, and it's wonderful to see him recognized on a national level.
normalised: Also, Professor Rajesh Kumar from I-I-T Delhi received the Padma Shri this year. Huge congratulations to him! His work in quantum computing has been groundbreaking, and it's wonderful to see him recognized on a national level.

unnormalised: Finally, a shoutout to Adv. Priya Patel, who just won a landmark case in the Supreme Court! She's a rising star in the legal field, and her dedication to justice is truly inspiring. Makes you feel good, doesn't it?
normalised: Finally, a shoutout to Advocate Priya Patel, who just won a landmark case in the Supreme Court! She's a rising star in the legal field, and her dedication to justice is truly inspiring. Makes you feel good, doesn't it?
